extendedIngredients.name: black beans
extendedIngredients.original: Optional add-ins: 1 (15-ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained; 1 jalapeño pepper, finely chopped (seeded to reduce heat, if desired)
extendedIngredients.originalString: Optional add-ins: 1 (15-ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained; 1 jalapeño pepper, finely chopped (seeded to reduce heat, if desired)
extendedIngredients.originalName: Optional add-ins: 1 black beans, rinsed and drained; 1 jalapeño pepper, finely chopped (seeded to reduce heat, if desired)

extendedIngredients.name: lime zest
extendedIngredients.original: 2 tablespoons freshly squeezed lime juice and the zest of 1 lime
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 tablespoons freshly squeezed lime juice and the zest of 1 lime
extendedIngredients.originalName: freshly squeezed lime juice and the zest of 1 lime

extendedIngredients.name: sharp cheddar cheese
extendedIngredients.original: Toppings: Shredded Mexican blend or sharp cheddar cheese; additional cilantro
extendedIngredients.originalString: Toppings: Shredded Mexican blend or sharp cheddar cheese; additional cilantro
extendedIngredients.originalName: Toppings: Shredded Mexican blend or sharp cheddar cheese; additional cilantro

extendedIngredients.name: skinless boneless chicken breasts
extendedIngredients.original: 2 pounds boneless, skinless chicken breasts (see notes)
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 pounds boneless, skinless chicken breasts (see notes)

title: Slow Cooker Cilantro Lime Chicken
instructions: In a slow cooker, mix together the salsa, lime juice and zest, taco seasoning, and optional black beans and jalapeño pepper.Add the chicken and flip to coat with the salsa mixture.Cook on low heat for approximately 6 hours (or 3 hours on high) or until the chicken is falling-apart tender. At this point, you may remove the chicken to a plate and shred with two forks before returning to the slow cooker. Or you may serve the chicken breasts whole.Stir in the 1/4 cup cilantro and serve over rice or your grain of choice. Sprinkle with cheese, and garnish with additional cilantro, if desired.

steps.step: In a slow cooker, mix together the salsa, lime juice and zest, taco seasoning, and optional black beans and jalapeño pepper.

Add the chicken and flip to coat with the salsa mixture.Cook on low heat for approximately 6 hours (or 3 hours on high) or until the chicken is falling-apart tender. At this point, you may remove the chicken to a plate and shred with two forks before returning to the slow cooker. Or you may serve the chicken breasts whole.Stir in the 1/4 cup cilantro and serve over rice or your grain of choice. Sprinkle with cheese, and garnish with additional cilantro, if desired.
